content.description: Nearly dead horizontal roof put up by Jason Cook in the early 2000's. If you can locate this roof, problem begins sitting in the back where the roof can be first started and climb straight out using occasional toe hooks and some right hand compression. Pulls around the furthest face directly straight out from the sit start and tops out/walk off.
content.location: Nearly dead horizontal roof that juts out from the cliff and makes a quasi-cave. You'll know it when you find it.
